description:
Welcome to Banshee Bay! Dr. Lupita Vavroom, our resident mad scientist and Manic Mechanic has discovered a way to bring dead cars back to life! Do you have what it takes to resurrect these racers from the great beyond? Grab a shovel and head to Banshee Bay to find outâ€¦ if you dare!

The Banshee Bay pack includes:

* A New Manic Mechanic Boss: Dr. Lupita Vavroom!
* Five New Halloween-themed Levels!
* Ghostly New Hazards and Vehicle Parts!
* Seven Spooky New Playable Characters!
* Use the new Purifier Station to de-curse haunted car parts!
* New Achievements and secrets to unlock!
name: Manic Mechanics - Banshee Bay
